thread.section_title: Novotel London Blackfriars - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great room
thread.title_full: Great room - Review of Novotel London Blackfriars, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Supermercado
title: Great room
text:
Our room was bright, clean and very comfortable. The view towards East London was a real plus. Housekeeping did a great job throughout the duration of our 4 day stay.
Minor concerns at front desk as they did not answer to our requirements, lacked professionalism and show little consideration overall.
Location was absolutely perfect. It is an easy and pleasant walk to the west end. Jubilee line was less than 5 min. walk from the hotel.
Would happily stay here again.
